property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Noble. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value:
The first player gains control of Aragorn. If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game.
Action: Spend 2 resources from Aragorn’s resource pool to ready a hero.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Noble. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost of the first Rohan ally you play from your hand each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have restricted attachments

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Deal 1 damage on Treebeard to give him +1 Ò and +1 Û until the end of the phase. (Limit 5 times per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dwarf. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, ready Gimli.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Silvan. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, draw 1 card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have attachments. Enters play exhausted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Quickbeam enters play, deal 1 damage to him to ready him.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Ready Háma. He gets +3 Ú until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Háma. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero or Legolas

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached character participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, exhaust Arod to place 1 progress token on any location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Ent.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +2 hit points.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Herugrim on Théoden by 1. Response: After attached hero is declared as an attacker, exhaust Herugrim to add attached hero's Ò to its Û for this attack.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Ent cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only after the resolving enemy attacks step is complete.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust and discard a Rohan ally you control to choose and discard a non-unique enemy engaged with you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control ☺ Aragorn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Choose 3 heroes committed to the quest. Ready those heroes. Until the end of the round, each of the chosen heroes gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mount. Mearas.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to Gandalf.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Gandalf gains ranged and sentinel.
Action: Exhaust Shadowfax to ready Gandalf.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: Attach to a Warrior hero.
Response: After attached hero is declared as the only attacker against a non-unique enemy, exhaust Intimidation to give that enemy –2 Ú for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: Attach to a Healer hero.
Action: Exhaust attached hero and Hands of a Healer to heal up to 3 damage from a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: Attach to a Ranger hero.
Response: After attached hero is declared as a defender against a non-unique enemy, exhaust Forewarned to discard 1 shadow card from that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: Attach to a Noble hero.
Response: After attached hero quests successfully, exhaust Leader of Men to add 1 resource to attached hero’s pool.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, +1 Ú and cannot have treachery card attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to ☺ Aragorn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Exhaust Aragorn and Palantír of Orthanc to discard the top card of the encounter deck. If Aragorn’s Ò is greater than the discarded card’s $, you may add Palantír of Orthanc to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool to choose a player. That player reveals 1 fewer encounter card this phase (to a minimum of 0).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Poisoned Counsels functions like a player card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After you draw this card, discard all other cards in your hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Uruk-hai

property.name: Text
property.value:
Treat each Captive’s text box as blank. Captive heroes are in play but are not under any player’s control. If there are no Captives in play, the players lose the game.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, increase the pursuit value by 1. Then, if the pursuit value is 30 or greater, the players lose the game.

While Saruman has any hit points remaining, the players cannot win the game.

property.value: The Uruk-hai

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the pursuit value.
Uglúk cannot leave the staging area or take damage.

property.value: The Uruk-hai

property.name: Text

X is the pursuit value.

The players cannot defeat this stage while Uglúk is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they have rescued each Captive hero and won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 7

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing Campaign Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Remove Gildor Inglorion and Mr. Underhill from the Campaign Pool. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck: (Shadow of the Past, Flight to the Ford, The Ring Goes South)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 7

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: If the pursuit value is 25 or lower, the players must choose: either each player earns one of the Skill boons (Intimidation, Hands of a Healer, Forewarned, or Leader of Men) and attaches it to a hero he controls, or one player earns the boon, Beyond All Hope, and chooses a hero from the list of fallen heroes. That player takes control of the chosen hero (removing it from the list of fallen heroes) and attaches Beyond all Hope to it. If a player controls more than 3 non-☺ heroes, he must remove heroes from the Campaign Log until he controls only 3 heroes. Changing heroes as a result of earning Beyond All Hope does not incur a +1 threat penalty. Add the earned cards to the Campaign Pool.

card.name: The King of the Golden Hall

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set The Defense of Helm’s Deep and 1 copy of Deeping Wall aside, out of play. Each player sets 1 copy of Soldier of Isengard aside, out of play. Then, the players must choose: either each player shuffles 1 copy of Poisoned Counsels into his deck, or advance to stage 2A (bypassing stage 1B).

alternate.name: The King of the Golden Hall

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 ally in his hand that matches the sphere of a hero he controls and puts it into play under his control.
Skip the quest phase and combat phase.
Forced: At the end of the round, advance to stage 2A.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add The Defense of Helm’s Deep and each set aside copy of Soldier of Isengard to the staging area. Make Deeping Wall the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck. Then, each player reveals 1 encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set

property.name: Text
property.value:
Defense. Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if the number of enemies in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, the first player reveals an encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Text
property.value:
Defense.
Forced: After resolving the quest, if the encounter deck did not place at least 1 progress on this stage as the result of questing, the first player reveals 1 encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the encounter deck until X enemies are discarded. X is the number of players. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Defense. Forced: After a character is destroyed, place 1 progress on this stage (bypassing any active location).
If this stage is defeated, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the encounter deck until X enemies are discarded. X is the number of players. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Helm's Deep

property.name: Text
property.value:
Skip the quest phase. Players cannot reduce their threat.
If there are no enemies in play, the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 8

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing Campaign Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player may change hero cards without incurring the +1 threat penalty. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck: (Shadow of the Past, Flight to the Ford, The Ring Goes South)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 8

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Each player with a copy of Poisoned Counsels in his hand, deck or discard pile has earned that burden. Add the earned cards to the campaign pool.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Road to Isengard

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Gates of Isengard, Orthanc, Saruman, and Saruman’s Staff aside, out of play. Add each copy of Ent of Fangorn to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Road to Isengard

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot draw cards or gain resources. Do not commit characters to the quest or reveal encounter cards during the quest phase. Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource here. Then, the players may advance to stage 2. If the players advance, the first player shuffles the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and reveals 1 encounter card for each resource here. Then, remove each Ent objective in the staging area from the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Road to Isengard

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Make Gates of Isengard the active location. Add Saruman and Orthanc to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Road to Isengard

property.name: Text
property.value:
The players cannot travel to Orthanc.
Forced: After a non-unique location is explored, place 1 damage here. Then, if there are 5 damage tokens here, advance to stage 3A.
Quest Action: Exhaust Ent of Fangorn to place 2 progress on a non-unique location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Road to Isengard

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player draws 6 cards. Each player with more than 6 cards in his hand discards cards from his hand until he has only 6. Attach Saruman’s Staff to Saruman.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Road to Isengard

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Orthanc is the active location, Saruman is considered to be engaged with the first player. Forced: When Orthanc is explored, cancel any progress placed on the quest this phase and return Orthanc to the staging area.
If a player has 0 cards in his hand, he is eliminated from the game. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 9

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing Campaign Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Shuffle Saruman’s Voice into the encounter deck. Remove each burden with these burden set icons from the encounter deck: (Shadow of the Past, Flight to the Ford, The Ring Goes South)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 9

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: If any player has 3 or fewer cards in his hand, the players have earned the Saruman’s Voice burden card. If any player has 3 or more cards in his hand, the players have earned the Palantír of Orthanc boon card. Add the earned cards to the Campaign Pool.
